tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  reaction_type VARCHAR(100),
  reported_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE drug_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    drug_name VARCHAR(50),
    reaction_description TEXT,
    report_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE drug_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_result TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES drug_reports(report_id)
);

CREATE TABLE adverse_reactions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    reported_by VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    reaction_description TEXT,
    report_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(20),
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    prescription TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(id)
);

CREATE TABLE healthcare_professionals (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    specialization VARCHAR(255),
    contact_number VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE reported_cases (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    case_description TEXT,
    reported_by VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Pending'
);
